Package it.polimi.se2019.controller.powerup

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NewtonController
    The newton powerup moves the targeted enemy player one or two squares in any direction.
    PowerUpController
    Powerups are cards that can be used to produce an effect or to pay an ammo cost.
    TagbackGrenadeController
    The tagback grenade can be used when taking damage to assign a mark to the offender.
    TargetingScopeController
    The targeting scope allows a player to spend one ammo of any kind to add one damage to an attack.
    TeleporterController
    The teleporter can be used by a player on his/her turn to move to any square on the map, regardless of distance or obstacles in the way.
